name: 張世豪
objective:
本課程介紹以 ARM CPU 為核心之嵌入式系統。內容包含：ARM CPU 介紹，ARM CPU 指令集，ARM 之 C 語言工具，ARM 發展環境，Linux 核心之介紹。之後透過「樹莓派」作為本課程的實作系統，開發語音互動、影像處理、設備間通訊、雲端資料庫使用等的應用。同學可以從實務操作中，學習嵌入式系統之軟體開發與應用的能力，完成生活中各種嵌入式系統應用的製作，及期末專題。

This course covers the following topics: introduction to ARM CPU, instruction set of ARM CPU, C compiler of ARM CPU, debugging tools for ARM CPU, functions of the evaluation board, writing and running C language in the evaluation board, introduction to Linux kernel. This course also introduces the basic concepts of software and hardware of embedded systems, and then uses "Raspberry Pi" as the implementation system of this course to develop voice interaction, image processing, communication between devices. Applications such as cloud database usage. Students can learn the software development and application capabilities of embedded systems from practical operations, and complete the production of various embedded system applications and final-term project.
